page.title: 06ST.ANNE'S C.E.PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {ST.ANNE'S}is an old school which used to be in the town centre close to { {St.Anne's Church.} It moved to Warwick Road on the outskirts of {Bishop {Auckland}owing to an increase in housing in that area. It was officially opened in 1972. Our school takes part in many sports activities including swimming, football, netball and athletics. Each year we have a Sports Day in which the three house teams Brancepeth, Raby and Witton compete against each other. They are named after local castles. My name is Heidi Sutton. I have been in Brownies for 4 months and guides a month.We use St.Anne's School hall for Brownies and Guides. Brownies meet at 6.00pm and finish at 7.00pm. Sometimes we go to the{DAM HEAD}by the river Wear to cook.
